explanations.machine learning: The paper applies neural networks to forecast volatility in option pricing, which is a machine learning approach.
explanations.neural network: The paper proposes a neural network coefficient (NNC) model to re-price option values, explicitly mentioning the use of neural networks.
explanations.deep learning: The NNC model uses neural networks to construct weight coefficients, which is a deep learning technique.
explanations.regression: The paper mentions applying the linear regression (LR) model to price option values, indicating the use of regression techniques.
explanations.backpropagation: Neural networks typically use backpropagation for training, though it is not explicitly mentioned, it is implied.
explanations.BP: BP is short for backpropagation, which is implied in the training of the neural networks used in the NNC model.
explanations.hidden layer: Neural networks usually consist of hidden layers, though not explicitly mentioned, it is implied in the structure of the NNC model.
